content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a swing. Moving in a clockwise direction from the swing, the elements on the path are a sandal, a magpie, a fiddler crab, a match, a sports car, a hoop skirt, a dung beetle, a scoreboard, a soup bowl, a water tower, a rifle, a projector, an airliner, a box turtle, a tights, a Golden Retriever, a plate, a tram, and a lab coat. Starting from the Golden Retriever, you move around the ring by 9 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 7 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 13 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 18 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

I have given you a circular map. At the start, you are positioned on the top dot of the path and you find a swing. The elements on the path are: sandal, magpie, fiddler crab, match, sports car, hoop skirt, dung beetle, scoreboard, soup bowl, water tower, rifle, projector, airliner, box turtle, tights, Golden Retriever, plate, tram, and lab coat.

Starting from the Golden Retriever, you move around the ring by 9 steps in a clockwise direction. This means you will move to the next dot after 9 steps. Then you move around the ring by 7 steps in a clockwise direction. This means you will move to the next dot after 7 steps. And then you move around the ring by 13 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. This means you will move to the dot located 13 steps away from your current position. And finally, you move around the ring by 18 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. This means you will move to the dot located 18 steps away from your current position.

So after moving around the ring in this order, you will find a projector on the next dot.
